trans-unit.source: Defines the usage of a key contained within an X.509 certificate.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageExtension> class uses the flags in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags> enumeration to define or determine key usage.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageExtension"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageExtension"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object and a value that identifies whether the extension is critical.
Use this constructor if the information to create the extension is already in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
The encoded data to use to create the extension.
`true` if the extension is critical; otherwise, `false`.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageExtension"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags"></xref> value and a value that identifies whether the extension is critical.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags"></xref> values that describes how to use the key.
`true` if the extension is critical; otherwise, `false`.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageExtension"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object.
The encoded data to use to create the extension.
Gets the key usage flag associated with the certificate.
This property returns a value from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageExtension.KeyUsages%2A> enumeration that indicates how to use the certificate key.
